amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to allocate funding to support research and grants to further innovation in the safe and secure storage, treatment, transportation, and disposal of spent nuclear fuel from civilian nuclear reactors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Keating.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
